title: ffmpeg installation undefined reference to
body:
dranger tutorias are old. I switched to ffmpeg v 0.11 and changed av_frame_free() to av_free() and file complied. I guess that the code is not compatible with 3.x.x

Update I installed ffmpeg v1.0.10 and the dranger tutorial01.c worked perfectly with even changing av_frame_free()

Thanks everyone
